responsibilities: Manage bank transaction, check weekly and monthly cash balance and report to Admim
Excellent communication and Interpersonal skills are essential
Ability to correspond and communicate independently with clients
Work experience in accounts will be an added advantage
Able to manage and control the junior accountants
Monitoring day to day finance operations, and company’s financial accounting, monitoring and reporting systems
Ensures all expenditure worksheets for accuracy and completeness
Prepare and maintain cash books ensuring completeness and accuracy of data entry.
Prepare and maintain accounts payable, receivable and payroll.
Prepares financial reports such as monthly profit and loss, balance sheet reports
data.about_me: I am currently a self-employed woman. Businesses include domestic tourism, production and sale of Ready-to-wear Burmese women’s clothing and distribution of food (spices). I am one ofthe Founder of the Myanmar Lesbian Organization which provides training for LGBT peoplethrough Entrepreneurship Training and Hormone Therapy Training. On the other sides, I’m teaching Mathematics in seventh grade and Economics in ninth grade since 2016 at the Monastic School in my township. And I also works as a part-time accountant at the largest Men clothing wholesaler in Yangon. In rural areas, students, also advises women and LGBT youth on Human Rights, Sexual and Reproductive Health, Personal Grooming and Hygiene, Feminist Leadership and SMEs.
